title: Start
body:
Welcome to Survivor
You can do alot in here
Try to use your gun, press CTRL
Great!
Zombies will try to catch you throughout the game
Now listen,
You have two options: 
[[Quit the game|Leave]]
[[Continue|LearnMore]]

title: Leave
body:
Oh, goodbye!
You'll be back soon!

title: TalkTo
body:
Can you help me?
My parents died from starvation
Will you help please?
[[Recruit him|Recruit]]
[[Some other time|OtherTime]]

title: Recruit
body:
<<recruitAction()>>
I will do anything i can

title: OtherTime
body:
Then, you doom me for an eternal of hard days, hunger, wounds
and possibly, death.
I thank you for your 'warm' hospitality
if I could, I would serve poison to you.
